newsArray.title: टीम इंडिया की सफेद जर्सी पहनना है सपना, जम्मू-कश्मीर के पेसर ने बताई दिल की बात
creator: AmleshNandan Sinha
newsArray.description: Auqib Nabi News: जम्मू-कश्मीर के तेज गेंदबाज औकीब नबी घरेलू क्रिकेट में लगातार धमाल मचा रहे हैं. 28 साल के इस गेंदबाज ने चल रहे दलीप ट्रॉफी में भी जलवा बिखेरा है. उन्होंने 4 गेंद पर 4 विकेट के साथ पांच विकेट चटकाए. इस प्रदर्शन ने उन्हें एक अलग पहचान दी है. नबी अब भारत के लिए टेस्ट क्रिकेट खेलना चाहते हैं और इसके लिए काफी मेहनत कर रहे हैं. The post टीम इंडिया की सफेद जर्सी पहनना है सपना, जम्मू-कश्मीर के पेसर ने बताई दिल की बात appeared first on Prabhat Khabar.

newsArray.ai_content: ONLY AVAILABLE IN PROFESSIONAL AND CORPORATE PLANS

newsArray.title: Davina Perrin hits quickest Hundred ton to fire Northern Superchargers women into final
creator: PA Media
newsArray.description: Northern Superchargers, 214-5, bt London Spirit, 172-9, by 42 runsSuperchargers smash Hundred record team score by 33 runsThe 18-year-old Davina Perrin made history with a 42-ball century to lift the Northern Superchargers into the final of the Hundred as they defeated London Spirit, the defending champions, by 42 runs in the eliminator. Perrin became only the second woman after Tammy Beaumont in 2023 to reach three figures in the 100-ball tournament with a stunning 101 off 43 balls, which included 15 fours and five sixes at the Oval.It was the fastest ton in the women’s competition and second quickest overall, with only Harry Brook’s 41-ball hundred for the Superchargers against Welsh Fire in 2023 eclipsing this salvo from Perrin. When that was put to her, Perrin, who was run out at the non-striker’s end, laughed and told Sky Sports: “One ball? Damn, I better hit the gym so I can send those sixes a bit further! Continue reading...

newsArray.title: श्रीसंत की पत्नी मुझसे क्यों गुस्सा हैं, मुझे नहीं पता, ललित मोदी का रिएक्शन
creator: Kamlesh Rai
newsArray.description: ललित मोदी ने श्रीसंत की पत्नी को जवाब दिया है. आईपीएल के पूर्व कमिश्नर ने कहा है कि उन्होंने वही बोला है जो सच है. ललित मोदी ने कहा कि उन्हें नहीं पता कि भुवेश्वरी क्यों उनसे गुस्सा कर रही हैं.

creator: Aamna Aamna
newsArray.description: Pakistan continues the United Arab Emirates Tri-Series 2025 by playing the second T20I match against the home team, UAE, at the Sharjah Cricket Stadium on Saturday, August 30. creator: INEWS
newsArray.description: One of the most anticipated matches of the Caribbean Premier League (CPL) is here. The Guyana Amazon Warriors (GAW) head to Trinidad and Tobago to face off against their fierce rivals, the Trinbago Knight Riders (TKR). creator: Megha Mallick
newsArray.description: Salman Nizar powers Calicut Globstars to victory in Kerala Cricket League with 12 sixes, in an impressive show ahead of the IPL auction.

newsArray.title: Salman Nizar unleashes mayhem: 40-Run over, 11 sixes light up KCL
creator: Vishal Menon
newsArray.description: Salman Nizar, the 28-year-old cricketer, blazed through a Kerala Cricket League game, smashing 11 sixes off 14 balls. He plundered 40 runs in the final over, setting a new record and propelling Calicut Globstars to victory. His explosive innings of 86 not out from 26 deliveries secured a 13-run win and the second spot in the KCL season.

newsArray.title: Watch: Babar Azam left stunned as fan breaches security to hug and kiss Pakistan star on the field
creator: Chankesh Rao
newsArray.description: Despite Babar's attempts to avoid the fan, security was unable to stop the fan before the physical contact took place. This moment shocked viewers and sparked concern regarding player safety and security measures at cricket matches.

newsArray.title: 'I want my Porsche': Yuvraj Singh's six-sixes bat now with Lalit Modi – here's why
creator: TOI Sports Desk
newsArray.description: Lalit Modi, the IPL's founder, pledged a Porsche to any Indian cricketer hitting six sixes or taking six wickets in an over during the 2007 T20 World Cup. Yuvraj Singh famously achieved this feat against Stuart Broad, prompting Modi to fulfill his promise. Yuvraj received his Porsche, and Modi acquired the iconic bat, a cherished memento of that historic moment.

newsArray.title: 'I want my Porsche': Yuvraj Singh's six-sixes bat now with Lalit Modi – here's why
creator: TOI Sports Desk
newsArray.description: Lalit Modi, the IPL's founder, pledged a Porsche to any Indian cricketer hitting six sixes or taking six wickets in an over during the 2007 T20 World Cup. Yuvraj Singh famously achieved this feat against Stuart Broad, prompting Modi to fulfill his promise. Yuvraj received his Porsche, and Modi acquired the iconic bat, a cherished memento of that historic moment.
